attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Should lose their seats in the House of Lords .
The UK has become a mainly secular society . In which a minority group 
( the Anglican church ) has powers beyond it's present and future status in society .
"the sixty year decline in church attendance in the UK. UK Church membership was 13.4% of the population in 1980, 9.4% in 2005 and is projected by Christian Research ** to drop to 4.5% in 2040. Sunday churchgoers of all denominations are expected to fall to less than a third of what they are now. And the churches? Around 10,000 Anglican churches – more than half of the total now in existence – are expected by Christian Research to close by 2040."  Research report from Tearfund 
The Anglican church may argue that it is needed for the moral and spiritual needs of the people. Whereas people ,in the majority , have clearly voted with their feet ,that this is not the case.
In fact it has been proven that the more theocratic a country the less altruistic and moral it is.
" A journal of religion and society "
